enchantment.chant_to_enchant.reflect.des: On block reflects projectiles back at the shooter.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.heated_iron: On block ignites the attacker for a short time.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.chain_react: Fires an additional arrow after a hit that seeks nearby mobs and can trigger this effect again.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.bloodshot.d: Holding the bowstring beyond maximum tension consumes your health to empower the next shot.
Transfers a portion of your fall damage to nearby mobs within a radius.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.engaged.des: Mining speed increases when repeatedly breaking the same block type, otherwise decreases.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.windblade.d: A charged attack summons windblades that deal extra damage and push enemies back.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.hexlash.des: Applies negative effects on hit with a chance. If enough effects are present, they are consumed to greatly increase damage.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.chains.desc: Links up to five nearby targets, preventing them from moving or attacking for some time.
Deals increasing damage when repeatedly striking the same target, otherwise decreases.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.outrunner.d: Sprinting gradually increases movement speed the longer you run.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.vortex.desc: Creates a vortex that pulls mobs inward, dealing periodic damage and possibly causing fall damage.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.redstone_ch: Consumes redstone dust to boost damage. Without redstone, damage is reduced.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.tossing.des: Launches hit mobs into the air.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.ripples.des: After diving into water, propels you upward and accelerates your movement.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.stealth.des: After sneaking for some time, makes you completely invisible until entity received or dealt damage to someone.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.gust.desc: On hit has chance to create a streak of unavoidable hits over short period of time, every once in a while.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.intuition.d: Exposes all angry enemies or players nearby.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.smelting.de: Automatically smelts mined block drops, consuming extra durability.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.ram.desc: Sprint forward and raise your shield to unleash a powerful charge, blasting enemies away.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.determinati: When a lethal blow is taken, unleash a devastating blast and revive with restored health, sacrificing this enchantment in the process. As exchange decreases maximum health.
enchantment.chant_to_enchant.dodge.desc: Sprinting allows to dodge incoming attacks briefly.
